name: Morning News Scraper
script:
import requests

print('[LOG] Starting news scraper task...')

try:
    resp = requests.get('https://hacker-news.firebaseio.com/v0/topstories.json')
    top_ids = resp.json()
    print(f'[LOG] Found {len(top_ids)} stories')
    
    # Get top 5
    for story_id in top_ids[:5]:
        r_item = requests.get(f'https://hacker-news.firebaseio.com/v0/item/{story_id}.json')
        story = r_item.json()
        print(f"[LOG] title: {story.get('title')}")
except Exception as e:
    print(f'[LOG] Error: {e}')

name: Repo Star Tracker
script:
import requests

print('[LOG] Checking stats for luoluoluo22/gh-action-log-monitor...')

url = 'https://api.github.com/repos/luoluoluo22/gh-action-log-monitor'
resp = requests.get(url)
if resp.status_code == 200:
    data = resp.json()
    print(f"[LOG] Stars: {data['stargazers_count']}, Forks: {data['forks_count']}")
else:
    print(f'[LOG] Failed to fetch stats: {resp.status_code}')

name: Quicker Recent Actions
script: import requests import re print('[LOG] Fetching recent Quicker actions...') url = 'https://getquicker.net/Share/Recent' headers = {'User-Agent': 'Mozilla/5.0'} try: resp = requests.get(url, headers=headers) html = resp.text pattern = r'href="/Sharedaction\?code=([^\"]+)"[^>]*>\s*([^<]+)\s*' matches = re.findall(pattern, html) results = [] seen = set() for code, name in matches: name = name.strip() if name and '\n' not in name and code not in seen: results.append({'name': name, 'url': f'https://getquicker.net/Sharedaction?code={code}'}) seen.add(code) print(f'[LOG] Successfully found {len(results)} new actions.') for action in results[:8]: print(f"[LOG] [Quicker] {action['name']} -> {action['url']}") except Exception as e: print(f'[LOG] Error: {e}')
